page.title: 19A Local Inhabitant.
page.content: My name is David Ross.I am 35 years of age and I live in Borthwick Mains Cottages near Middleton.I am married and my wife is expecting a child in Sept.I am a music instrutor and my main instruments is the flute although I play many more.I travel around primary and secondary schools working with various age groups. I enjoy living in this remote,lonely area.I wouldn't like to live in a built up city again it's beautiful here.No pollution,noise or crowds of people.It does have it's drawbacks though.In winter we can be snowed in and we must plan our visits to town carefully as we just can't pop out to the shops easily.A car is essential as were not on a bus route.On the whole we really enjoy it here.
